Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Relates to establishing a twenty-five year retirement plan for firefighters employed by the division of military and naval affairs
Summary: Establishes a twenty-five year retirement plan for firefighters employed by the division of military and naval affairs.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the retirement and social security law, in relation to establishing a twenty-five year retirement plan for firefighters employed by the division of military and naval affairs
